Package arc.util.io

Class Writes

java.lang.Object
arc.util.io.Writes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class Writes extends Object implements Closeable
A wrapper for DataOutput with more concise method names and no IOExceptions.
